javadoc:
Represents the collection of actions registered with the tool, along with method for adding
 and removing actions.

methods.name: addLocalAction
methods.comment: Adds the given action that enabled when the given provider is active

methods.name: getLocalAction
methods.comment: Gets the provider action by the given name

methods.name: removeLocalAction
methods.comment: Removes the given provider's local action

methods.javadoc:
Adds the given action that is enabled, regardless of the active provider
@param action the action
methods.name: addGlobalAction
methods.comment: Adds the given action that is enabled, regardless of the active provider

methods.javadoc:
Removes the given global action
@param action the action
methods.name: removeGlobalAction

methods.javadoc:
Removes all global actions for the given owner
@param owner the owner
methods.name: removeActions
methods.comment: Removes all global actions for the given owner

methods.javadoc:
Removes all local actions for the given provider
@param provider the provider
methods.name: removeActions
methods.comment: Removes all local actions for the given provider

methods.name: getActions
methods.comment: Returns all actions with the given owner

methods.javadoc:
Returns all actions known to the tool
@return the actions
methods.name: getAllActions
methods.comment: Returns all actions known to the tool

name: DockingToolActions
comment:
Represents the collection of actions registered with the tool, along with method for adding
 and removing actions.
